p: District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holden at Tacoma (to wit: Tacoma) in and for the County of Pierce
John Lanmeister and John Tod Plaintiffs vs W. C. Shattuch Defendant}

John Tod being duly sworn, on oath doth depose and say: That he is one of the plaintiffs in the above enitled action; that the plaintiffs at all times hereinafter mentioned were and still are copartners in business under the name or style of Lanmesiter and Tod; that a cause of action exists in favor of the plaintiffs as co-
partners as aforesaid against W. C. Shattuck, the defendant in said action, and that the nature of said cause of action is as follows, to wit:
